awd_titl_txt: Group Travel to the International Diffusion in Metals and   Alloys (DIMETA-88) Conference, Balatonfured, Hungary,       September 5-9, 1988
awd_abstract_narration: Travel support is provided for scientists to attend the                    international conference on diffusion, September 1988, in                       Hungary.  This conference, which is held once about every 6                     years, provides a forum to discuss recent results related to                    diffusion in materials.  Specific subjects to be covered include                diffusion in new materials (nanocrystalline materials,                          quasicrystals, high Tc superconductors), grain boundary diffusion               and migration, sintering, diffusional creep, precipitation and                  dissolution.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
